Others: Matches streamed live and free on FIFA+

You will be able to watch Matchday 1 and Matchday 2 African qualifiers on FIFA+ with English commentary from anywhere in the world, with the exception of the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region, sub-Saharan Africa*, India, Austria, France, Germany, Portugal and Switzerland.
Highlights of the matches will also be available on FIFA+ worldwide.
Matches streamed live on FIFA+ during this international break include all the African qualifiers and the CONMEBOL qualifier between Bolivia and Peru.
